          <title>
            <string language="et">Hobune</string>
            <string language="en">The horse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Pferd</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le cheval</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O cavalo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il cavallo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το άλογο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El caballo</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">PowerPointi esitlus lasteaia vanemale astmele hobusest- tema välimusest, elukohast, liikumisest, järglastest, toitumisest ja kasutamisest.</string>
            <string language="en">PowerPoint presentation for the kindergarten older group about horses- its appearance, habitat, movement, offspring, feeding and usage.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Alusharidus</string>
            <string language="et">Loodus</string>
            <string language="et">Loomad</string>
            <string language="en">Basic Education</string>
            <string language="en">Nature</string>
            <string language="en">Animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">PowerPoint Darstellung für die ältere Gruppe 
des Kindergartens über Pferde sein Aussehen, Lebensraum, Bewegung, 
Sekundärteilchen, Einziehen und Verbrauch.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation de PowerPoint pour le groupe 
supérieur de jardin d'enfants au sujet des chevaux son aspect, 
habitat, mouvement, progéniture, alimentation et utilisation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação de PowerPoint para o grupo mais 
velho do jardim de infância sobre cavalos seus aparência, habitat, 
movimento, prole, alimentação e uso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione del PowerPoint per il gruppo più 
anziano di asilo circa i cavalli la relativi apparenza, habitat, 
movimento, prole, alimentazione ed uso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">PowerPoint παρουσίαση για την παλαιότερη ομάδα 
παιδικών σταθμών για τα άλογα - η εμφάνιση, ο βιότοπος, η 
μετακίνηση, ο απόγονος, η σίτιση και η χρήση του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de PowerPoint para el más viejo 
grupo del jardín de la infancia sobre caballos su aspecto, habitat, 
movimiento, descendiente, alimentación y uso.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Natur</string>
